Articles.Content: I want to know how to upgrade from 0.23 to 0.24 and how to keep my Campaign mode the same. I'm 100% sure there is a FAQ or someting that tells me, so if someone could point me to that info?

I want to know how to upgrade from 0.23 to 0.24 and how to keep my Campaign mode the same. I'm 100% sure there is a FAQ or someting that tells me, so if someone could point me to that info?

what I do is I go to the ksp website, log in, and re-download ksp. you can easily transfer your save files, and in 0.24 they have 3 modes you can run in: sandbox(same old same old), career(the one with contracts and money) and science, which is carer mode without money.

if that is your question.

Do you mean you want to convert a 0.23 Career mode save into at 0.24 Science mode, which are essentially the same (no contracts)?

That's covered in the 0.24 FAQ in the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials subforum. First, you'll want to copy the KSP/saves/[your save name] folder over to your 0.24 install.
Thanks. I assumed a "redownload" would download 0.23. And the link seems to cover science mode.
